description: A forbidden island in the New World split into two halves - one a burning inferno and the other a frozen wasteland - as a result of a battle between Akainu and Aokiji. Formerly a government research facility where dangerous experiments were conducted.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Frozen Prisoners
keyEvents.description: Nami and Chopper discover a room filled with frozen people in prison garments, revealing more of the island's dark past.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the cruel experiments and dark history of Punk Hazard's government research days.

keyEvents.title: Law and Smoker Confrontation
keyEvents.description: Law is revealed to be on Punk Hazard, working with Caesar Clown, leading to a confrontation with Smoker and the Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the three-way conflict between the Straw Hats, Marines, and Law on the island.

keyEvents.title: Law Lifts Marine Warship
keyEvents.description: Law uses his Room and Tact abilities to lift the G-5 Marine warship, preventing their escape from the island.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale of battles that will take place on Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: Island is being used by Caesar Clown for illegal experiments

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: The main research facility on Punk Hazard where Caesar Clown conducts his experiments on children and develops weapons. Contains frozen prisoners from past experiments.

keyEvents.title: Frozen Prisoner Room Discovery
keyEvents.description: Nami and Chopper discover a horrifying room filled with frozen people in prison garments.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the extent of the cruel experiments conducted in the facility.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Escape with Children
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats and rescued children burst out of the laboratory entrance.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the escape from the laboratory and the beginning of the outdoor confrontation.

statusHistory.reason: Being used by Caesar Clown for experiments
